title: Vogue Williams and Spencer Matthews take walk with baby son Theodore
text:
They recently revealed they the tied the knot for the second time at Westminster Boating Base on the banks of the River Thames last month, in front of their reality star pals.

And Vogue Williams and Spencer Matthews looked happier than ever as they took their 13-month-old son Theodore out for a family walk in Chelsea, London on Tuesday.

Reality star Vogue, 34, stunned in a bright blue floral midi-dress, while her Made In Chelsea hunk husband, 31, looked dapper in a navy blazer.

Family: Vogue Williams and Spencer Matthews looked happier than ever as they took their 13-month-old son Theodore out for a family walk in Chelsea, London on Tuesday

Irish model Vogue showcased her fashion credentials as she teamed her floaty, long-sleeved dress with a jazzy pair of glittering silver boots.

Accessorising her look, the former The Jump star added a pair of gold hooped earrings and gold necklaces.

The star swept her blonde tresses into a chic ponytail, while she showcased her natural beauty by donning little make-up for the outing.

Meanwhile, Spencer teamed his smart blazer with a light blue shirt blue jeans and brown boots.

Fashionable family: Reality star Vogue, 34, stunned in a bright blue floral midi-dress, while her Made In Chelsea hunk husband, 31, looked dapper in a navy blazer

Style Queen: Irish model Vogue showcased her fashion credentials as she teamed her floaty, long-sleeved dress with a jazzy pair of glittering silver boots

Glam: Accessorising her look, the former The Jump star added a pair of gold hooped earrings and gold necklaces

While, little Theodore looked adorable in a bright yellow jacket as he enjoyed a day out in his pram.

The couple could barely keep the smile off their faces as they enjoyed a brisk autumnal stroll with their beloved boy.

And their dazzling grins are no doubt due to the fact their reality show, with the new name of Spencer and Vogue and Wedding Two, will return to screens on Monday.

Earlier this week, Spencer and Vogue promoted their show on Instagram, sharing previously unseen clips from their wedding.

Dapper: Meanwhile, Spencer teamed his smart blazer with a light blue shirt blue jeans and brown boots

Vogue's featured a montage of clips from their wedding and other unseen footage featuring their adorable son Theodore, while Spencer posted a hilarious interview with the pair.

In the montage, the couple can be seen at their recent second wedding that was officiated by Spencer's best friend and fellow Made In Chelsea star Jamie Laing.

The promo promises: 'More laughs, some added cuteness and a wedding party' while text that appeared over a clip of their wedding read: 'This is what true love looks like'.

The pair sat down for a pre-show interview which Spencer uploaded to his Instagram where he and Vogue discussed the difference in their height.

So sweet: The couple could barely keep the smile off their faces as they enjoyed a brisk autumnal stroll with their beloved boy

Back on screens: And their dazzling grins are no doubt due to the fact their reality show, with the new name of Spencer and Vogue and Wedding Two, will return to screens on Monday

Vogue said: 'When I wear heels I'm like 6'2. But because of him...'

Spencer said: 'I'm taller than you, so...'

'A millimetre taller than me,' Vogue quickly added.

'Did you hear the second part of that? "A millimetre" what?' Spencer said.

'Spen, I wouldn't be that boasty about a millimetre. You're still small for a boy,' Vogue said.

Their second wedding took place at Westminster Boating Base on the banks of the River Thames included Hugo Taylor and Millie Mackintosh as guests.

TV: Earlier this week, Spencer and Vogue promoted their show on Instagram, sharing previously unseen clips from their wedding

Vogue, who looked incredible in a strapless Kate Halfpenny jumpsuit with a overlay skirt, told Hello!: 'He was so funny, he just made the whole thing hilarious - but he was sweet too, he said such lovely things about us and he knows us both so well, so it worked out perfectly.'

Spencer said: 'We get on so well, laugh all the time, and just don't bicker. I feel like I have married my best friend - twice.

'If I could marry Vogue every year, I would, but two weddings will do. I think we are probably done now.'

Back in June 2018, Vogue and Spencer married in an intimate ceremony in front of family, including his brother James Matthews and his wife Pippa Middleton, at his stunning 10,000-acre family estate, Glen Affric, in Cannich, Scotland.

Spencer and Vogue and Wedding Two airs on E4 on Monday at 10pm.
description: Vogue Williams and Spencer Matthewsa looked happier than ever as they took their 13-month-old son Theodore out for a family walk in Chelsea, London on Tuesday.
